评论详情: I was excited. Thought I finally found cute stuff in my size. But it's not even close. MUCH smaller than a 4xl. I ordered it bigger than I needed, so I went up 2 sizes just to be safe (because I know its a UK based company and the style is fitted). And it doesn't  even button at any point on my body. So large girls, this isn't a size inclusive brand. It's just another one that slaps a plus size sticker on their products. It's maybe a US XL, but only just.

The print is really adorable and looks like the pictures, however, the fit is so weird. It fits like a shirt that you would expect a server to wear. It’s very boxy with no shape to it. It fits my larger bust but it was really loose around the shoulders and neck. I would have had to get it tailored for it to look good on me. I wish I would have taken a picture of it, but I ended up returning it. Maybe if you have small boobs and can get a small size so it’s fitted, it would look ok.
Looks cheap, not worth the money

The size guide was next to useless, if I'm being honest. Aside from knowing what my size is, I also know how to measure myself. I purchased my size, the shirt was extremely tight, and was not true to the size it was supposed to be.
I absolutely love this shirt. It’s soft, it’s detailed. It looks just like the picture. The fit is perfect. Can’t wait to wear it out.
TONS of compliments on this! SO CUTE
Cute, quality, true to size!!! Not a thing I can complain about.

I bought this blouse for a 50s themed event. The fabric is good quality. I still wear it to work, and it has held up for... I want to say around 20 washes. Still looks good. Only thing I don't like is that it's very long, so I always have to wear it tucked in.

评论概述: Runs Small, Order One Size Up
评论详情: I’ve been dying to order this for soooo long and they finally had it back in stock in my size. After almost a year of stalking this blouse, I was so excited to receive it and then completely devastated because it wouldn’t fit. I know I’m well endowed in the bust area, but even then it was definitely at least a size too small. I’m lucky that I know how to sew and I want to wear this so badly that I’ll deconstruct it to add lace panels so it actually fits, but I’m still pretty devastated months later that it doesn’t fit me as it comes originally. I really wish they made stuff in larger sizes for those of us that have a large bust. 😭 Their stuff is adorable but I wish they were more inclusive. Kind of devastated still.
I was sent men’s size large red tube socks.  Looks nothing like the shirt I ordered, and it’s a pain in the ass to get to a return center.  Thanks for the overpriced socks!
I love the shirt! The fabric is better than anticipated. However, the organza bow tie is missing for my item.
Very cute and comfy. It does wrinkle and runs a little small. Would definitely buy again but a size up. I am 5ft 1, 150 pounds and wear a 36 DD . I got a large and the buttons gap.

I got a size medium. Should have gotten a small. I am 5'6" and about 125lbs. I had to take in about aninch and a half on each side. But was super cute. Now I know more my size and would be confident ordering again knowing my size.
This shirt fit me well, although I did take the tie off because I didn’t like the look of that. It’s a little stiff, but I’m hoping it will soften overtime.

评论概述: Faded significantly with a single wash
评论详情: This immediately faded and lost a significant amount of the green coloring after the first wash. It now has a softened, worn look to it which is an aesthetic in itself, but doesn't really jive with this particular style/aesthetic.
Shrank in the first wash - so sad :(

I have been eyeballing this shirt on other sites for quite a bit more money. Arms have elastic, so no need to worry about arms being too tight.  The shirt has a loop to run the ribbon through so that it will stay in place. Material is soft soft and a lovely orange color, foxes are really cute.  I bought my usual size and it fits perfectly.
Super cute, super soft!

I bought this blouse to wear for work events such as meetings and conferences. I absolutely love it! Fits great (size Large with C cup) it doesn’t pinch anywhere and buttons up with ease. Every time I wear it, I get compliments on the cute design!

评论概述: Cheap, Poorly Made and Runs Much Smaller Than Stated
评论详情: I was really excited to get this blouse. It's so difficult to find cute clothing with foxes on it, which is why I was willing to spend so much on it. Considering how expensive this blouse is, it's very poorly made. The material is very rough and despite extra effort, I cannot get the wrinkles out. The little black ribbon is permanently deformed as well, so I just removed it and threw it away. The blouse is much smaller than what the size chart suggests. Just all around disappointing.

Cute shirt but way overpriced for the quality. I hand washed it and laid it to dry and the texture of the shirt turned rough. When i went to wear it again it totally shrunk and it gaped open on my chest. Bummer.  Also runs small - I’m typically an xl/xxl but I ordered a 3x and it fit good.

I usually wear an XL but had to get a 3X. Also I had to sew along the buttons, because they are too far apart and exposing my skin underneath. I adore the pattern, but the buttons gaping was disappointing, as well as needing to go so many sizes up for a comfortable fit.

评论概述: No extra room for busty  individuals.
评论详情: I got this for work but can't wear it because it looks like a can of biscuits is going to explode but the bottom half fits fine.
Cool shirt. I’m a size 16 with 40” waist; bought 3x and it fits and is not tight.
It’s my style I wish it was more styles to choose from.

This shirt was super cute and fit perfectly. I got a size up because I have a larger bust but it had no gaping or pulling. The only problem I have is that it was damp when I received it and it had a funny smell that dissipated as it dried.
Super cute blouse, it was exactly what I wanted, fits true to size.
I had the play the sizing game and buy one that was smaller than the recommended size on the size chart. It super cute, however wrinkles easily and will need an occasional ironing.

I ordered according to sellers size chart so it fits, but...  the cut is more boxy than expected - not the pin-up girl aesthetic I expected from HellBunny (the maker, not the shop).  Shirt is well made and the print is adorable so I'll just have it tailored.

评论概述: This vixen feels foxy in this shirt
评论详情: I LOVE this shirt! The quality of fabric is fantastic with a silky softness (only downside is it wrinkles easy). Its cut shows off my hourglass figure perfectly, and had a nice hang that fell just right in the front and back. No complaint on length, i thought that was in the goldilocks zone. Definitely fits to size, and Im impressed. I may replace the sheer ribbon with opaque, i feel like the ribbon looks too stiff. I would definitely buy other hell bunny items based on the flattering fit of this one! Im a happy lady ^-^
Love this top, perfection and looks awesome on. I'm a size 16/18 normally and 4XL works great.
Very happy with my foxy blouse. It's beyond cool.
Top is just adorable and fit me perfectly.
I'm very skinny so its a little big but tucked in with a pair of jeans or skirt and it looks fantastic! Now one of my favorite shirts. I highly recommend
So stylish and well made.  I want to buy more from this label.  Very pleased

I love all of Hell Bunny and Voodoo Vixen products but  this blouse is just too cute!  I was guessing at sizes (they are British based) so I purposely got an XL. I rather it be too big than too small.  took it to my local alterations lady who took it in on the sides and in the chest and BAM!  it's PERFECT!  i am also a natural red head so the color scheme of the background and the little foxes took about 5 years off my 41 years of age!  Great blouse, great brands!
Tres jolie mes le Ruben pas trop fan
Lovely blouse which I had been looking at got a long time, quick delivery too
Chemisier très jolie! Sans imperfection ! La marque taille légèrement  petit .

È una bella camicetta. Fresca, bel tessuto è bel colore. Ho cambiato il fiocco, mettendone uno di raso e mi piace di più. Fa la sua figura e si abbina facilmente con molto outfit. L'unica pecca è che le volpi sono stampate in maniera poco, anzi nulla, precisa. Quindi se vista nel dettaglio non rende.
Sieht klasse aus und passt super.

This blouse is so unbelievably lovely! The fabric is nice and comfortable (and feels very well made!), the buttons are sewn on well and the pattern/ colour is the same as the pictures! The bow is made of an interesting material but I love how it’s detachable. I may replace it with a more satiny/ opaque fabric later on, but for now I’m pretty big fan!

Me ha encantado el diseño de esta camisa El color y la forma es exactamente como se ve en las fotos la tela es fuerte, opaca y de buena calidad, aunque se arruga casi con mirarla El lazo de organza yo lo cambie por un lazo negro normal aunque el que trae la camisa es bastante bonito (cuestión de gustos)
very nice! 👍
I love it ❤️

Le mie colleghe al lavoro me la invidiano :D Questa camicetta è davvero bellissima, taglia perfetta (ho preso una M, sono alta 1.70m x 65kg), ottimo materiale. Ho cambiato il fiocco perché non mi piaceva (è un po' trasparente e non è molto scuro), ho messo un nastro nero che avevo in casa e devo dire che è più carina così.
Sieht aus wie auf dem Bild. An den Armen ein bisschen eng und am Bauch eher locker geschnitten. Macht eine schöne Figur

Erano anni che desideravo un articolo della serie Vixey di Hell Bunny, e finalmente mi sono decisa ad acquistare questa camicia. La spedizione è arrivata puntuale e senza problemi, il pacchetto semplice e ben imballato. La camicia in sé è esattamente come in foto, con la stampa di volpi adorabile e un bel colore arancio-castano che fa subito autunno. Il fiocco al collo è fissato sul retro e quindi regolabile, dà un tocco in più speciale. Ho preso una S, che è la mia normale taglia, e mi sta perfetta. Non stringe e non fa difetto, veste comoda e le maniche hanno un elastico morbido che non fa effetto insaccato. È veramente particolare e darà un tocco unico ad ogni outfit, promossa!

Die Bluse passt super und der Fuchs-Print, sowie die Farben gefallen mir sehr gut(Habe die grüne Variante). Die Schleife aus Tüll-Stoff unterstreicht das Outfit, ist aber leider etwas steif. Insgesamt ein sehr schönes Kleidungsstück, dass nicht jeder hat.
Lovely top!
Stoff und Verarbeitung wunderschön!! Bin ganz verliebt!! Lieferung innerhalb von 3 Tagen!! Jederzeit wieder!!
Lieber größer bestellen, da trotz Extra Feinwäsche die Bluse um eine Nummer kleiner wurde. Die Bluse ist sehr gut verarbeitet und sieht toll aus. Der Druck ist scharf und farbenfroh.

Vraiment moche et très cher pour ce que c'est. Tissu minable, aucune forme une fois porté (pas cintré du tout). La photo présentée est clairement retouchée (le pire c'est le nœud je crois !). Je renvois illico les 2 hauts commandés de cette "marque inconnue" et très bas de gamme.
Fits great looks great . Really happy with it .
Love to colour and design. I'm a bit of a rock chick so like having some 'edge. Normally wear Red, but love the green on me, and the bow at the collar ads a bit extra :)
Très joli chemisier. Ai pris ma taille habituelle.

Cute print, has a little loop under the collar to keep the ribbon bow under control. Removable. The size chart is total fiction. I’m 5’4”, 140, 43” around the chest and got a 2XL. It was ludicrously Hawaiian-shirt big. Sleeves hanging past my elbows and easily two sizes too big across the chest. Going back.

Love the fit and pattern. Flatterning design and fabric that moves with your body. One problem is the button allignment, had to sew some snaps to ensure my chest was not exposed. Also, do not let the ribbon go through the wash cycle. Was a bit bummed by the unexpected duty tax to pay on it. Overall, it is my new favorite shirt, but want others to learn from my mistakes.
Hübsches Muster, aber eher für den Herbst. Passt genau.
